article_title: Fueling The Fiscal Crisis: Frank Mazur
article_text:
Saint Johnsbury, VT (05819)

Today

Partly cloudy with afternoon showers or thunderstorms. High near 85F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Isolated thunderstorms during the evening. Mostly cloudy skies after midnight. Low 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
